fields.description:
I am using jolokia and activemq installed on fabric8 v1.0:

curl -u <USER>:<PASSWORD> -s http://localhost:8181/jolokia/read/org.apache.activemq:type=Broker,brokerName=amq1,service=JobScheduler,name=JMS

{"request":{"mbean":"org.apache.activemq:brokerName=amq1,name=JMS,service=JobScheduler,type=Broker","type":"read"},"stacktrace":"java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument's element itemDescriptions[15] cannot be null.

","error_type":"java.lang.IllegalArgumentException","error":"java.lang.IllegalArgumentException : Argument's element itemDescriptions[15] cannot be null.","status":400}

Activemq log does not contain any error log.

fields.summary: Exception when getting list of scheduled jobs via JMX
